name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 13 years of diverse experience in software design, data structures, algorithms, and query execution, specializing in **C++** and **MongoDB Atlas**. Proven track record in developing high-performance applications that leverage distributed systems and cloud-native solutions. Expert in implementing **Change Streams** for real-time data processing and management.

Leveraging a comprehensive tech stack including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **Node.js**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to deliver robust full-stack applications. Demonstrated experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on automation and predictive analytics.

Proficient in deploying systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and adept in modern software practices like CI/CD pipelines and microservices architecture. Strong advocate of compliance-driven development with working knowledge of HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Passionate about mentoring junior developers and fostering collaboration within the team.
